name: Blam! Bagheera - Do you mine?
description:
Blam Bagheera - Do You Mine?  is a platformer with a lot of explosives and some puzzle elements. The story is supposed to unveil along with Blam!`s exploration of his grandfathers old coalmine. 

Arrowkeys or [A] [D]  -  Walk
[SPACE]  - Jump
[I]  - Inventory
[E]  - Open
[CTRL]  - Throw Bang!

Hidden secrets may be buried beneath your feet.

PS : Still early in Development  

Credits: 
Music : Laff
Everything else : Tyneo
